description: Register a system with RedHat subscription manager

username.description: Username for account which is registering the system

serverurl.description: Another host to register with instead of subscription.rhn.redhat.com

baseurl.description: the name of the content delivery service to configure the yum service to pull down packages

consumerid.description: existing system inventory id to re-register the system

activationkey.description: comma-separated list of product keys to redeem

auto_attach.description: automatically attaches the best-matched, compatible subscriptions to this system

servicelevel.description: sets the service level (standard, premium, self-support) to use with subscriptions

force.description: registers the system even if it is already registered

org.description: registers the system to an organization

environment.description: registers the system to an environment within an organization

proxy.description: registers the system via a proxy server

proxyuser.description: If using proxy, the username to use with the proxy
